name: Exercise 4 (kergt)
description:
The scene shows a pond. The user can add fish, turtles, butterflies, leaves, lilies, and insects by pressing different buttons. In the background of the scene there is moss building up, which will eventually fill up the water entirely.

Keys to press to get the desired animated content:

Butterfly = B

Fish = F

Leaf = L

Insect = I

Turtle = T

Click mouse to add lilies.

To position an item in a precise location in the scene first hover the mouse and then click on the key.

Music playing in the background:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/nature-essentials-208...

Unity Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lowpoly-water-1075...
